definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Frame of the pistol is made from polymer.
sentences.chinese: 手槍的槍架是利用聚合物做成的。

sentences.english: The linear rods are supported by engineered polymer plastic bushings.
sentences.chinese: 線性棒支持的聚合物塑料套管。

sentences.english: Viscosity improvers are polymers with molecules that expand when they get hot.
sentences.chinese: 粘度改良劑是聚合物分子，當他們得到擴大熱點。

sentences.english: Annular groove and three lubrication holes in the outer ring; covered with a polymer band.
sentences.chinese: 外圈帶環形槽和三個潤滑孔，有聚合物帶覆蓋。

sentences.english: Chemical modification was carried out by the radical polymerization of KH-570 and acrylate monomer.
sentences.chinese: 改性後的樹脂具有丙烯酸樹脂和有機硅聚合物的優點。

sentences.english: Salt tolerance and temperature resistance properties of this dipolymer were investigated preliminarily.
sentences.chinese: 初步考察了該聚合物的耐鹽抗溫性能。

sentences.english: This is solid state up here, aggregates of atoms.
sentences.chinese: 這是固體，是原子的聚合物。

sentences.english: Polymers of vinyl chloride or of other halogenated olefins, in primary forms.
sentences.chinese: 初級形狀的氯乙烯或其他鹵化烯烴聚合物。

sentences.english: The advantages and disadvantages of different polymer-based Chiral stationary phases are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 重點介紹了手性聚合物固定相的分類和應用的新進展。

sentences.english: The calcium tolerance of phosphonic acid is lower than polymer type scale inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 有機膦酸的鈣容忍度低於聚合物防垢劑。

sentences.english: Radiation-induced graft copolymerization is an important technologies for surface modification of polymers.
sentences.chinese: 輻射接枝是聚合物表面改性的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: The invention relates to various aromatic diacid ester acetal polymers and a synthesis method of the aromatic diacid ester acetal polymers.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及各種芳香二酸酯縮醛聚合物及其合成方法。

sentences.english: Methacrylate polymer emulsion is an important ingredient of floor coating.
sentences.chinese: 丙稀酸酯聚合物是地板蠟產品中的一個重要成分。

sentences.english: Polymeric micelle has its own unique advantages with respect to drug delivery.
sentences.chinese: 聚合物膠束作爲藥物載體具有其獨特的優勢。

sentences.english: A polymer comprising hydrophilic and hydrophobic properties is provided.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供一種具有親水和疏水性質的聚合物。

sentences.english: Monocyclic carboxylate is a dispersive-type polymer nucleating agent.
sentences.chinese: 單環羧酸鹽屬於分散型聚合物成核劑。
